line_1: In her experience all her friends relied,
line_2: Heaven was her help and nature was her guide.

line_1: On all his study'd Speeches still rely'd,
line_2: Nor fear'd to err, whilst led by such a Guide:

line_1: Friends, on whose faith the trusting heart rely'd,
line_2: Th' indignant spirit, when with selfish pride,

line_1: Friends, on whose faith the trusting heart rely'd,
line_2: The ills they ought to soothe, with taunts deride,
